command.name: load
command.title: Memory Load Command (/memory:load)
command.description: Delegate to universal-executor agent to analyze project via Gemini/Qwen CLI and return JSON core content package for task context

intent.primary_user_value: Analyze the current project and load a structured Core Content Package into memory for subsequent tasks

must_not: run destructive shell commands without explicit user request
expose secrets from env/files in the returned package
